text: @Mike_Pence You Mr. Vice President lost all credibility the moment you sat your water bottle on the floor in unison w/ Trump. There is no "our Administration", there is only Trump. The future has yet to be written unless you believe in Trump's magic thinking as in a disappearing coronavirus.
